experience.description: Built optimized Spring Boot APIs with Redis and load balancing. Designed secure microservices integrated with AWS Cognito. Developed Kafka-based communication services for scalable messaging. Implemented RabbitMQ–Kafka pipelines for high-throughput systems. Optimized PostgreSQL and MongoDB schemas for performance. Learned CI/CD automation using Jenkins and Kubernetes.
